General.Name: Geoprima Solusi Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Geoprima Solusi Tbk distributes survey tool products in Indonesia. The company offers total stations, RTK receivers, UAV solutions, and theodolite products. PT Geoprima Solusi Tbk was founded in 1997 and is based in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia.
General.Address: Rukan Artha Gading Niaga Blok D-9, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14240
